content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Burner Mining Drill at position (41, -82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) - currently working and extracting resources.
- Chest (position (40.5, -83.5)) - stores coal.

### Stone Furnace at position (61, -54)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (61.0, -54.0)) - currently working but has no ingredients to smelt.

### Burner Mining Drill at position (-15, -50)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) - currently working but waiting for space in destination.

### Copper Plate Mine
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) - currently working and extracting iron ore.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check if the target position is free.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when trying to place an entity too far away
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place a new entity.

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory before trying to craft or place new entities.
